about.bio: Full Stack Software Engineer with 7+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Skilled in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and SQL, I'm passionate about crafting innovative solutions that exceed user expectations.
educationSummaryLines: B.Sc Degree in Computer Engineering and Informatics

projects.title: Personal finances PWA
projects.description: Managing personal finances should be simple, transparent, and cost-effective. Personal Finances PWA solves these challenges with a fully offline-capable, cost-efficient, and AI-powered solution that gives users complete control over their financial data. Built with PWA technology, it ensures seamless offline functionality by storing data locally using SQLite on OPFS, supports background syncing via Service Workers, and integrates with Google Sheets for cloud accessibility—all without the need for backend servers or database hosting.
projects.shortDescription: A powerful, offline-first finance app that gives users full control over their data. It integrates AI insights, local storage, and Google Sheets sync for seamless expense tracking and budget management. Perfect for individuals, families, and businesses—without hidden costs or restrictions.

features.name: Offline-First Experience
features.description: Access and manage finances anytime, even without an internet connection.

features.name: Local Storage with SQLite
features.description: Ensures seamless and secure offline data access using WebAssembly OPFS.

features.name: Google Sheets Sync
features.description: Allows users to own, share, and collaborate on financial data using Google Sheets.

features.name: AI-Powered Insights
features.description: Provides personalized financial insights and recommendations using Local LLM, DeepSeek, and OpenAI APIs.

features.name: No Hosting Costs
features.description: Deployed as a static web app, eliminating backend expenses and reducing maintenance overhead.

features.name: Multi-User Collaboration
features.description: Ideal for families, teams, or small businesses to manage shared finances efficiently.

features.name: Fully Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for desktops, tablets, and mobile devices for a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Jawadi Finances
projects.description: A full-stack financial management application tailored to our family's needs. Demonstrated proficiency in building scalable, user-centric applications with a focus on data privacy and security. By centralizing all monthly transactions, we gained complete visibility into our spending habits, enabling data-driven decisions and optimized budgeting. This resulted in a substantial 25% increase in monthly savings. Key features include collaborative budgeting, spending analysis, customizable spending limits, and a user-friendly dashboard with interactive graphs for visualizing monthly and yearly expenses.
projects.shortDescription: A family finance app to help us track our spending and create budgets. It's been a game-changer, boosting our savings by 25%!

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Provides a detailed overview of monthly expenses and budgets, with filters by store and payment type.

features.name: Calendar Integration
features.description: Includes a robust calendar for visualizing daily expenditures.

features.name: Transactions Page
features.description: Enables adding, updating, and deleting transactions, organized by months.

features.name: Budget Page
features.description: Allows monthly budget planning based on current expenses and balances.

features.name: Metadata Management
features.description: Customize categories, payment types, and transaction types as per specific needs.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Ensures data security and privacy by requiring authentication to access transactional data.

features.name: You can test the application by test user
features.description: The email is: test@coderduo.com. password is Test@123

projects.disclaimer: This app is no longer available as it is currently not hosted.

projects.title: HDR Data Exploration
projects.description: The HDR Data Exploration System is a web-based application designed for exploring and analyzing Human Development Resources data. It offers powerful tools and interactive features for filtering, sorting, and exporting data on various development indicators like GDI, IHDI, GII, PHDI, and MPI. This platform supports informed decision-making, policy development, and research initiatives aimed at improving human well-being globally.
projects.shortDescription: The HDR Data Exploration System is a web application for exploring Human Development Resources data. It offers interactive tools for filtering, sorting, exporting, and analyzing various development indicators.

features.name: Data Coverage
features.description: Comprehensive data coverage Across multiple development indices.

features.name: Data filtering
features.description: Flexible Data Filtering Based on various parameters like Country/Region/Group, Year, indicators.

features.name: Dynamic data visualization
features.description: Through interactive displays.

features.name: Sorting
features.description: Efficient data sorting and organization by Year, value.

features.name: Data Export
features.description: Versatile data export options For further analysis (JSON, Excel).

projects.disclaimer: This app is not working properly because the backend is not currently hosted.

projects.title: Bukhara Restaurant
projects.description: A fully responsive and user-friendly web application for Bukhara Restaurant, providing a seamless online experience. The application features a visually appealing interface, intuitive navigation, and a range of functionalities to enhance customer engagement.
projects.shortDescription: A user-friendly and responsive web app for Bukhara Restaurant, offering a seamless online experience with menu browsing, location information, and online ordering.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: An engaging homepage with a captivating hero image and a dynamic slider showcasing the restaurant's delectable offerings.

features.name: Menu Page
features.description: Implemented a robust search functionality to help users quickly find their desired dish. Leveraged a REST API to dynamically populate the menu with detailed information and visually appealing cards.

features.name: Location Page
features.description: Integrated Google Maps API to provide accurate location information and convenient route directions. Users can easily input their location and receive tailored directions.

features.name: Contact Page
features.description: A user-friendly contact form to facilitate communication with the restaurant. Users can submit their queries, suggestions, or feedback directly through the form.

features.name: Shopping Cart Page
features.description: A functional shopping cart system with features like adding, removing, and modifying items. Users can easily review their order and proceed to checkout

projects.disclaimer: this web application is a personal project and is not affiliated with the actual Bukhara Restaurant. It was developed to showcase my skills in web development and is not intended for commercial use.

projects.title: Eilia Tour Company Website
projects.description: This project involved designing and developing a website for Eilia Tour Company, a fictional travel agency specializing in unique and personalized travel experiences. The goal was to create a user-friendly platform that showcases their offerings and captures the essence of adventurous exploration.
projects.shortDescription: Eilia Tour Company website: A visually stunning and user-friendly platform designed to promote unique travel experiences.

features.name: Visually Captivating Design
features.description: Eye-catching imagery showcasing breathtaking destinations alongside a clean and modern layout to promote a sense of wonder and exploration.

features.name: Interactive Features
features.description: Interactive destination carousels and a user-friendly booking system for a seamless user journey.

features.name: Compelling Content
features.description: Clear and informative descriptions of tours and destinations, along with testimonials and call-to-action buttons to encourage user engagement.

projects.title: Game Hub
projects.description: Game Hub is a dynamic web application that empowers users to effortlessly explore and discover their next favorite game. By leveraging the GameAPI and React, the platform offers a curated collection of games, meticulously organized by genre and platform. Immerse yourself in a visually appealing interface featuring sleek card designs and a user-friendly sidebar for seamless navigation
projects.shortDescription: Game Hub is a React-powered game discovery platform that simplifies finding games by genre and platform.

features.name: Comprehensive Game Catalog
features.description: Explore a vast library of games with detailed information and captivating visuals.

features.name: Advanced Filtering
features.description: Easily refine your search by genre and platform to discover tailored game recommendations.

features.name: Intuitive Sorting
features.description: Organize games by release date, title, or other criteria to suit your preferences.

features.name: Dynamic Interface
features.description: Enjoy a visually striking design with customizable dark and light themes.

features.name: Loading Indicators
features.description: Experience smooth performance with skeleton loading screens for essential elements.

features.name: API Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrates with the GameAPI to provide accurate and up-to-date game data.

projects.disclaimer: This project was developed as a learning exercise based on a publicly available tutorial. While the foundational concepts and structure were derived from this external resource, the implementation, customization, and problem-solving applied during the project demonstrate my ability to comprehend, adapt, and extend technical knowledge.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: Calculator is a user-friendly, component-based React application designed for efficient one and two-digit arithmetic operations. It offers a clean interface with reusable components, enabling seamless calculations for basic mathematical functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
projects.shortDescription: A simple yet effective React calculator for basic arithmetic operations.

features.name: Basic Arithmetic
features.description: Performs addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division for one and two-digit numbers.

features.name: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Offers an intuitive design for easy interaction.

features.name: Component-Based Architecture
features.description: Built with reusable components for modularity and maintainability.

features.name: Clear Display
features.description: Provides clear and immediate calculation results.

features.name: Efficient Performance
features.description: Delivers fast and accurate calculations.

projects.disclaimer: This app is no longer available as it is currently not hosted.
